title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.40 - Answer; filing; service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.40 - Answer; filing; service

State Regulations

The party or parties against whom the charge is filed may
file an answer within 10 calendar days after receipt of the charge from the
director of PEPR. Upon application, and for good cause shown, the director of
PEPR or designated hearing officer may extend once the time within which the
answer shall be filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

263.40

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
